Room.Name: Waters Near the Mooring Dock
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the shark infested waters just below the mooring dock.
Room.LongDescription: As you thrash in the water, you see various forms of sea life swimming around you. You also see the half-eaten remains of previous victims in the water. Several hungry sharks have begun to take notice of your presense here. Nearby you see a rope hanging from the side of the ship. Looks like you have two choices; back to the ship full of pirates, or swim toward the open sea. What are you going to do?
